name: Cold Noses
description:
This is a snowball fight game I made for Cozy Winter Jam 2022, hope you like it!

Sorry about the UI and no music, I was running out of time :P

Controls:

MOVE - WASD

CATCH BALL - LEFT CLICK WHEN NEXT TO SNOW

THROW BALL - LEFT CLICK WHEN YOU HAVE A SNOWBALL

CHANGE CHARACTER - Q and E

Game made in 3 days by: Andrei Souza
